si.title: 2 dead, over 30 injured as bus carrying KDU students topples in Badulla
body_lines: අද (01) පෙරවරුවේ බදුල්ලා නුවරදී අන්හින්ඩා පාරේ ඩන්හින්ඩා පාරේදී බස් රථයක් පෙරළීමෙන් පසු අවම වශයෙන් පුද්ගලයින් දෙදෙනෙකු මියගොස් ඇති බව තහවුරු වී තිබේ.
ඔවුන් ගමන් කරමින් සිටි බස් රථයක් තුළ ජෙනරාල් ශ්රීමත් ජෝන් කොටලවල ආරක්ෂක විශ්ව විද්යාලයේ දකුණු මණ්ඩපයේ ශිෂ්යාවන් දෙදෙනෙකු මියගොස් ඇති බව වාර්තා වේ.
Meanwhile, six injured persons are receiving treatment in the Intensive Care Unit (ICU) at the Badulla Hospital.
තුවාල ලැබූ මගීන් අදා ඩෙරානා වාර්තාකරු වන අඩා ඩෙරානා වාර්තාකරු පවසන පරිදි බදුල්ලා රෝහලට ඇතුළත් කර ඇත.
A bus carrying a group of university students had reportedly overturned at around 7:45 a.m. අද.
The accident had occurred between the third and fourth kilometer posts on the Badulla-Mahiyanganaya main road, near the Dunhinda access road, after the bus collided with a bund.
According to police, a significant number of university students have sustained serious injuries in the accident.

ta.title: 2 dead, over 30 injured as bus carrying KDU students topples in Badulla
body_lines: At least two persons have been confirmed dead after a bus carrying around 40 passengers toppled across the road at Dunhinda Road in Badulla this morning (01), injuring 35 persons.

ஜெனரல் சர் ஜான் கோட்டலாவலா பாதுகாப்பு பல்கலைக்கழகத்தின் (கே.டி.யு) தெற்கு வளாகத்தின் இரண்டு பெண் மாணவர்கள் தாங்கள் பயணம் செய்த பஸ்ஸுக்குப் பிறகு இறந்துவிட்டதாகக் கூறப்படுகிறது, ஒரு களப் பயணத்தில் இருந்தபோது, ​​புல்லாவில் உள்ள டன்ஹிண்டா சாலையில் ஒரு செங்குத்துப்பாதையை வீழ்த்தியது.
இதற்கிடையில், காயமடைந்த ஆறு பேர் படுல்லா மருத்துவமனையில் தீவிர சிகிச்சை பிரிவில் (ஐ.சி.யூ) சிகிச்சை பெற்று வருகின்றனர்.
The injured passengers are being rushed to the Badulla Hospital, according to Ada Derana reporter.
A bus carrying a group of university students had reportedly overturned at around 7:45 a.m. இன்று.
The accident had occurred between the third and fourth kilometer posts on the Badulla-Mahiyanganaya main road, near the Dunhinda access road, after the bus collided with a bund.
According to police, a significant number of university students have sustained serious injuries in the accident.
